MainClaim.text: "The widespread availability of generative artificial intelligence (AI) models poses a threat to human creativity

CreativeObsolescence.text: "AI may make human creativity obsolete in various aspects of our lives."

ValueOfCreativity.text: "One underappreciated value of creativity is that it plays an important role in connecting us to others."

LazyReliance.text: "The widespread availability of AI models tempts us to rely on them for creative tasks

DiminishedConnection.text: "The reliance on AI for creative tasks diminishes our prospects for social connection."

LazyRelianceInScience.text: "The reliance on AI in science may lead to a diminished ability to understand the underlying mechanisms responsible for protein folding."

ScientificProgress.text: "Scientific progress requires not only advances in predictive power but also advances in understanding."

HumanConnection.text: "Human connection is vital for the pursuit of scientific explanations."

EmersonOnConformity.text: "Conformity to dead social norms scatters one's force

RelianceOnAI.text: "Outsourcing creative work to AI means that one's choices are determined by something other than the exercise of one's own capacities."

Alienation.text: "Becoming less creative in the age of AI increases our risk of remaining strangers to each other."

AlphaFoldExplaining.text: "AlphaFold cannot explain why it generates its predictions

AlphaFoldUnderstanding.text: "Understanding the underlying mechanisms responsible for protein folding requires creative theorizing and the ability to explain why predictions are made."

ScientificProgressUnderstanding.text: "Scientific progress requires not only advances in predictive power but also advances in understanding."

HumanConnectionInScience.text: "Human connection is vital for the pursuit of scientific explanations."
